original_text: God was also punishing the people of Shechem for the evil things that they had done. When Gideon's son Jotham had cursed them, he said that these things would happen.
korean_text: 또 세겜 사람들의 모든 악행을 하나님이 그들의 머리에 갚으셨으니 여룹바알의 아들 요담의 저주가 그들에게 응하니라

sentences.original_text: God was also punishing the people of Shechem
for the evil things that they had done
When Gideon's son Jotham had cursed them
sentences.korean_translation: 기드온의 아들 요담이 그들을 저주했을 때

sentences.original_text: he said that these things would happen
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이러한 일들이 일어날 것이라고 말했다
